title: Please reconnect to game
body:
i just finished a match and then after it i didnt get the stats and then i got disconnected from pvp, then i restarted my client and now..im stuck at the page saying you have left a game in progress. ;_; i finished that game arghhh

and when i reconnect its all black and says i cant connect. my nets fine too

replies.body:
i have a problem similar to this. if i ever crash or something and (attempting to reconnect) appears.After finishing that game. When i start a new game after champion select screen in that champion load screen...its all black and after about 10 seconds it says that i cant connect check my firewall. -.-

i have to quit the client and then get back on to play again.( which leads me into punishment as well from leaver buster)

Re-connect loop lol, im stuck in it too. Read that it last for about 2 hours, haven't found any fixes other than waiting yet.
